DOC.brief_summary: High quality bowel preparation essential successful colonoscopy . This study aim assess impact reinforce education Wechat short message service ( SMS ) quality bowel preparation . This prospective , endoscopist-blinded , randomize , control study conduct . Reinforced education group receive additional education via reminder Wechat SMS 2 day colonoscopy . The primary outcome quality bowel preparation accord Boston Bowel Preparation Scale ( BBPS ) . The secondary outcome include polyp detection rate ( PDR ) , adenoma detection rate ( ADR ) , tolerance , subjective feeling patient .
